name: Altium Designer Multi-board Project
summary: Learn about .PRJMBD files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: The PRJMBD file type is a native project format only associated with Altium Designer. The format enables users to save multiple PCBs as one assembly, which includes the ability to add .PRJPCB files to a PRJMBD file with Altium Designer.
Other native project file types supported by Altium Designer include the following:

instructions: You can only open PRJMBD files with Altium Designer. To open a PRJMBD file with Altium Designer, select File â†’ Open Project.
